name: Boppy Bunny's Rootin' Adventure
description:
Boppy Bunny sure likes to dig!
  When it comes to root veggies she's sort of a pig.
Help her eat them all!
  An order that may seem tall!
Have fun making her zag and zig!

Controls

Use WASD, arrow keys or game pad (d-pad).

Global Game Jam 2023!

This game was made as part of the Global Game Jam 2023!  The theme for this jam was "roots" - and so we went with root veggies.  As a diversifier we picked "Year of the  Rabbit".
